title: 😈Today is Nakiri Ayame's Debut Anniversary🎉
body:
🎉Happy 7th Anniversary Nakiri Ayame!🎉

hololive 2nd Generation's beloved oni princess!
A radiant soul who's charmed the world with elegance, energy, and an unmistakable laugh that warms hearts💖

Ojou's captivating voice and mischievous smile are a true blessing✨
Whether she's an island destroyer or not🏝️
every one of her appearances feels like a gift🎁

Congratulate Ayame on her milestone below✨

🔽Be sure to check out her Anniversary Stream for today's Nakirium fix!
https://www.youtube.com/live/uRa-uLMea7w

channel.name: hololive News
channel.guideline:
Get updated on the latest news and information about hololive✨
Engage by leave likes and comments on posts and freely start conversations!🗣️
